metadata.dc:author: Rodríguez-Reynaga, D
Ortega-Galván, J
Lozoya-Legorreta, X
Enriquez-Habib, R
metadata.dc:description: The hypotensive activity of the alcoholic and aqueous extracts of C. edulis has been previously reported. The present paper describes the pharmacological studies of a substance isolated from the alcoholic extract. Preliminary chemical and pharmacological data allowed a histamine-like compound to be proposed as the hypotensive principle. Studies were performed by means of in vitro and in vivo animal experiments.
metadata.dc:title: Isolation of a hypotensive substance from seeds of Casimiroa edulis.
